character.statement: They’re only letting very important people on the train!
I never would have suspected Mlle. Moreau of being a thief.
The Chicago World’s Fair sounds like the most spectacular event in the history of the world!
You’re the one who caught that thief! Well done!
I sure wish I could afford to go to Chicago.
The fair was exhausting! Good thing it happens only every four years.

exchange.question: Need a hand?
exchange.answer: If you could help me get my luggage onto the train, I’d be in your debt!

character.statement: Can you help me get my luggage on the train?
Say, how would you like to come along with me to Chicago? I’m sure I could use your assistance again!
Meet me at my cabin once you board the train.
They won’t let me on the train. Well, I didn’t want to go to the World’s Fair anyway!
Want to solve the mystery all over again? Open your island map and press 'restart island'!
Everybody who's anybody is on that train -- even my favorite writer, Mark Twain!
My goodness, I hope my next train ride is less eventful.
It’s a long trip to Chicago, but it’ll be worth the wait to see that Fair.
In the future, I bet we’ll have flying machines that can take us from DC to Chicago in hours, not days!
